mapper.insert: insert into `comment` (uid, vid, did, content, topid, fid, hisuid, type, atid, atname) values (#{uid}, #{vid}, #{did}, #{content}, #{topid}, #{fid}, #{hisuid}, #{type}, #{atid}, #{atname})
insert into `like_info` (type, cid, hisuid, uid, vid, did) values (#{type}, #{cid}, #{hisuid}, #{uid}, #{vid}, #{did})
insert into `at` (uid1, uid2, vid, did, cid, atname, attitle, type) values (#{uid1}, #{uid2}, #{vid}, #{did}, #{cid}, #{atname}, #{attitle}, #{type})
mapper.delete: delete from `like_info` where cid = #{cid} and uid = #{uid} and type = 2
mapper.select: select * from `comment` where vid = #{vid} and topid = 0 and deleted = 0 order by ${order} desc
select * from `comment` where did = #{did} and topid = 0 and deleted = 0 order by ${order} desc
select * from `comment` where topid = #{id} and deleted = 0 order by time
select * from `comment` where (uid != #{uid} and hisuid = #{uid} and deleted = 0 and topid = 0) or (fid = #{uid}) order by time DESC
